Banner.Description: I have 2 years of experience in web and desktop application development. I focus on writing clean and reusable code in various technologies, applying best practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 2 years of experience, I have held various roles: web developer, desktop application developer. I enjoy using my skills to create innovative solutions that solve problems.
My skills include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing models, and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
I also program projects for personal use, out of interest or necessity.
The technologies I have worked with include (but are not limited to): Java, Spring Boot, Angular, Laravel, NodeJS, React, Java Swing, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Laravel Developer Intern
Description: Created a Web application for tracking production of field workers.

Experience.Jobs.Title: NodeJS and React Developer
Description: Developed a software for managing school kits.

Experience.Jobs.Title: JAVA Swing Developer Intern
Description: Created a school stock management application.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: E-commerce Project
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed an E-commerce project using Spring Boot and Angular.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Client Management for a Bank
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Designed and developed a client management project for a bank using Java Web and Servlet. This software includes features for account creation, withdrawal, deposit, and money transfer.

OtherProjects.Title: Other Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Sales Management for a Wholesaler
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created sales management projects for a wholesaler with 2 other interfaces. These applications handle billing and sales statistics.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Student Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a student management project. This application handles student grades.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Training Equipment Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed an application for managing training equipment.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I would be happy to discuss new opportunities with you. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as possible.
